short_summary: *Transport* - The Department of National Defence is soliciting industry applications to renew its 2022 Air Transportation Source Lists.
description: 1. Background: DND moves materiel and personnel domestically and internationally on an as required basis to support operations. A new competition is procured for the same scope of contracts that are expiring on 18 November 2022.
